UDP.name: UDP
UDP.stream_server: gst-launch-1.0 -v filesrc location="/home/matt/Documents/BBB_dec.raw" ! video/x-raw, format=I420, width=1280, height=720, interlace-mode=progressive, multiview-mode=mono, multiview-flags=0:ffffffff:/right-view-first/left-flipped/left-flopped/right-flipped/right-flopped/half-aspect/mixed-mono, pixel-aspect-ratio=1/1, chroma-site=mpeg2, colorimetry=bt709, framerate=24/1  ! queue ! rawvideoparse format=i420  width=1280  height=720  pixel-aspect-ratio=1/1  framerate=24/1 ! queue ! identity sync=true ! queue ! x264enc speed-preset=ultrafast tune=zerolatency pass=quant quantizer=35 threads=0 key-int-max=15 ! queue ! rtph264pay seqnum-offset=0 ! udpsink host={addr} port=5000
UDP.stream_client: gst-launch-1.0 udpsrc address={addr} port=5000 caps="application/x-rtp, media=(string)video, clock-rate=(int)90000, encoding-name=(string)H264, payload=(int)96, seqnum-base=(int)0" ! queue ! rtpjitterbuffer latency={buffer_delay} do-retransmission=true rtx-delay=0 mode=0 rtx-delay-reorder=0 rtx-retry-period={buffer_delay} ! rtph264depay ! queue ! h264parse ! queue  ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert !  fakesink -v
